original_title: Call for examinor applications for 2022 (2023) O/L exams
original_body_lines: The Examinations Department today called for applications for marking examiners for the 2022 (2023) GCE Ordinary Level (O/L) Examinations. Applications for marking of the GCE (O/L) examinations started today and will conclude on June 15.
The Commissioner General of Examinations H.J.M.C Amith Jayasundara, requested examiners ro support the programme considering it as a national task.
Accordingly, the examiners were advised to log on to https://onlineexams.gov.lk/eic/ to apply. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
